channel.title: How's the family
channel.description:
Drama with comment, designed to show in an entertaining way how important the family is to the people in it.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Square pegs in round holes
item.description: The struggle of a boy against his father's pressure in the choice of a vocation.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Radio programs--United States.

item.title: Adolescent fancy
item.description: Two wise parents endure but limit the unpredictabilites of their adolescent son.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Radio programs--United States.

item.title: School behind the home
item.description: Parent-teacher relationships, with the child as interpreter and misinterpreter of what happens at school.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Teachers--Drama

item.title: 48 hours in a day
item.description: The changing form of the family and some common disrupting influences.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Radio programs--United States.

item.title: Out in the cold
item.description: The new baby causes a child's resentment.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Children--Drama

item.title: What will people think?
item.description: A portrayal of extremes in attention and indifference to public opinion about home habits.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Public opinion--Drama.

item.title: Home: Route 1 or 79th Street
item.description: This program dramatizes family life and rural-urban migration.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Rural-urban migration--Drama.

item.title: The family is here to stay
item.description: This final episode in the series is a summary of ideas broached in the various programs. A roundtable discussion with four of the academic advisers for the series is the core of this program.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Radio programs--United States.

item.title: Life without father
item.description: This program dramatizes the challenges that divorce presents to parents and their children.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Divorce--Drama.

item.title: Adolescents on the loose
item.description: A story showing that problematic adolescents can be created by unthinking parents.
item.dc:creator: Cederholm, Fred
item.dc:subject: Radio programs--United States.
